name: EmberView
description:
EmberView is a little project I have worked on for University. Thought I would put it here as proof of concept and maybe it is something that I could re-write and work on properly adding everything that I wanted to add but BETTER

Whilst having more time to update GFX, change things around etc... Leave a comment and let me know what you think!

If you think its terrible and I should stop developing games then just be gentle with your comments

NOTICE - I HAVE BUILT FOR LINUX AND MAC BUT I AM UNABLE TO TEST THESE VERSIONS OF THE PROTOTYPE

Features / Unexpected Features (Bugs)

  • Hopefully no annoying SFX / Ambience
  • Custom Control Binding
  • One Playable Character
  • Sound Sliders (Only works on pause menu in-game... OOPS!)
